welcome_message_body: Welcome to Inabe, Japan! Get ready to experience the charming blend of traditional and modern culture in this beautiful city known for its scenic landscapes and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Inabe has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Komaki AFB Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Komaki AFB Airport is used for military aircraft and personnel.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal exclusively for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
